sentences.en: Despicable as the fat restaurant detective was, his crime was less than theirs.
sentences.cn: 虽然那个饭店的胖侦探长行为卑劣, 但他所犯的罪却要比他们的轻一些.

sentences.en: From beginning to end his conduct had been despicable and wicked.
sentences.cn: 从头到尾他的行为既卑鄙又可恶.

sentences.en: He is too nice a man to do anything as despicable as murder.
sentences.cn: 他这人太光明磊落了,根本不可能去干谋杀这类可鄙的事.
忘恩负义是可鄙的不道德行为.

sentences.en: It is despicable to desert your children.
sentences.cn: 你抛弃你的孩子是卑劣的.

sentences.en: It was a pathetic and wonderful and at the same time a despicable spectacle.
sentences.cn: 这是一幅悲惨、奇怪而同时又可鄙的景象.

sentences.en: It was an absolutely despicable thing to do.
It's because you have made up your mind to do something despicable.
sentences.cn: 那是因为你打定了主意要做叫人看不起的事.

sentences.en: It’s despicable the way he treats those kids.
sentences.cn: 他那样对待那些孩子，真卑鄙。

sentences.en: Let us at least see our courts make an example of these despicable criminals.
sentences.cn: 至少让我们看到法庭惩罚这些十恶不赦的罪犯以儆效尤。

sentences.en: Somehow, that seemed a despicable occupation.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么, 这好象是一种可耻的行径.
卑贱的人总是 “ 安全的 ”.

sentences.en: The mentality of these country people is despicable.
sentences.cn: 这里人们的心理状态真是太差了.

sentences.en: They played a shameful [ despicable ] role in this farce.
sentences.cn: 他们在这场闹剧中扮演了可耻 [ 鄙 ] 的角色.

sentences.en: To me, all these spontaneous responses of his were contemptible and despicable.
sentences.cn: 他的这些,在我看来都是笑柄,可鄙的.

sentences.en: What a despicable creature [ mean fellow ] !
